name: Door Scramble
description:
A game where you enter a door, and you end up dying to spikes.

Can you beat the game as fast as you can? 

FEATURES:

  • Hard platforming
  • Bullet-hell
  • Speedrunning

CONTROLS:

  • A and D, to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • Enter to enter a door
  • E to shoot. Shooting has 4 second cooldown. 

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Download .zip
  2. Exract the zip file to folder in your desktop
  3. Double click on DoorScramble.exe
  4. Enjoy

Made for the Lost Relic Games game jam 2022.
